ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: CANCAP-III, Sta. 3.178: off Mauritania; 20°23'N 17°04'W; depth 18.5 m, coarse sand with many Venus-shells; van Veen grab; 1.xi.1978
CANCAP-II, Sta. 2.007: Canary Islands, S of Fuerteventura, Punta de Jandia; 27°48'N 14°24'W; depth 2000 m, plain with pteropod ooze; anchor dredge; 24.viii.1977
CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.159: Canary Islands, SW of Palma; 28°40'N 17°59'W; depth 400 m, muddy sand; van Veen grab; 4.vi.1980
Sta. MAU.034: Off Mauritania; 18°46'N 16°40'W; depth 167 m, muddy fine sand, some shell gravel; van Veen grab; 9.vi.1988

ncrsdatagroup.abcd:ProjectTitle: Collecting trip to the Azores in 1979

ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: AZO.021: Azores, Terceira, E coast, Porto Martins, S side of bay; 38°41'N 27°03'W; rocky shore, stones, sponges and algae; shore-collecting; 30.ix.1979
CANCAP-VII, Sta. 7.110: Cape Verde Islands, W of Sal, off Palmeira; 16°46'N 23°02'W; depth 85 m, calc. and volc.sand with foraminifera; van Veen grab; 31.viii.1986
CANCAP-VII, Sta. 7.038: Cape Verde Islands, SE of Cima; 14°57'N 24°38'W; depth 410-460 m, yellow-grey calcareous sand and shell gravel with some basaltic pebbles; ; 24.viii.1986
CANCAP-VII, Sta. 7.031: Cape Verde Islands, SE of Cima; 14°57'N 24°38'W; depth 75 m, yellow Foraminifera sand; van Veen grab; 23.viii.1986
CANCAP-V, Sta. 5.150: Azores, E of Flores; 39°25'N 31°06'W; depth 200 m, coarse calcareous sand with shell gravel; van Veen grab; 9.vi.1981
CANCAP-V, Sta. 5.139: Azores, W of Pico; 38°34'N 28°33'W; depth 77 m, sand and shell gravel; van Veen grab; 7.vi.1981
CANCAP-V, Sta. 5.135: Azores, N of Faial; 38°37'N 28°36'W; depth 180 m, fine volcanic sand with many shells; van Veen grab; 6.vi.1981
